long_description: Whether you're riding the half-pipe or hucking cliffs on your snowboard, the waterproof Burton Latitude shell jacket protects you from the cold, wet weather you'll encounter on the mountain. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) 2-layer coated nylon shell with critically taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. Breathable taffeta lining keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture. Contoured, adjustable fleece hood fits the shape of your head, providing good warmth without obstructing vision. Removable waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Includes zippered hand pockets, a zippered chest pocket and a sleeve pocket; two internal stash pockets and an internal goggles/media pocket. The Burton Latitude shell jacket is built for layering without being overly baggy; sleeves are designed with a bit of extra length to fit over your gloves and keep snow out.
short_description: Whether you're riding the half-pipe or hucking cliffs on your snowboard, the waterproof Burton Latitude shell jacket protects you from the cold, wet weather you'll encounter on the mountain.
